Author: Kid Icarus
Name: Encore
Description:
One-Click Dance & Emote Mod Management

Create presets for your favorite dance and emote mods, then activate them instantly with a single click or custom chat commands. Automatically handles Penumbra mod priorities, conflict resolution, and mod option switching so your animations always show correctly.

Key Features: Custom chat commands, automatic priority management, smart emote detection, idle/sit/doze pose support, preset folders, icon picker, drag & drop organization, and align-to-target for group emotes. Perfect for anyone who uses multiple animation mods.
Punchline: Your dance mods, one command away.
